bystander_can_help.title: Things a bystander can do to help

actors.name: Things a bystander can do to help
actors.text: Things a bystander can do to help:

actors.name: Help the victim get away from the bully.
actors.text: Help the victim get away from the bully.

actors.name: Invite the victim to join your group.
actors.text: Invite the victim to join your group.

actors.name: Offer to go with the victim to report the bullying.
actors.text: Offer to go with the victim to report the bullying.
